title: An Ohio judge ordered a man to get a Covid-19 vaccine as a condition of his probation
content:
1. An Ohio judge ordered a man to get a Covid-19 vaccine as a condition of his probation  CNN
  2. Malaysia to relax restrictions after Covid-19 vaccination ramp-up  The Star
  3. Malaysia to ease COVID curbs for fully vaccinated in eight states  Yahoo News
  4. ‘Incredible guilt.’ Father of 4 fights for life after Utah family skips COVID vaccine  Idaho Statesman
  5. Relaxed Covid-19 restrictions: Solat prayers allowed at mosques for all phases of NRP  The Star

localize.title: オハイオ州の判事が、保護観察の条件として男性にCovid-19ワクチンの接種を命じた。
俄亥俄州的一名法官命令一名男子接种Covid-19疫苗，作为其缓刑的一个条件。
俄亥俄州的一名法官命令一名男子接種Covid-19疫苗，作爲其緩刑的一個條件。
